short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remotely go to next song on some streaming websites (currently YouTube and Spotify)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables any device compatible with websocket to control your browser in order to play next the next song on a variety of music/video streaming websites. Supported websites could grow with updates.
